website_summaries.verdict: Made by dermatologists, this scrub acts as a polisher to buff and tone your skin.
pros: Gets rid of dry patches on your skin
Can be used up to four times without irritation
Scrub polishes skin, making it easier to apply makeup
Also reduces the appearance of fine lines
Works well for all skin types
cons: The consistency is a little thin

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Clinique changed it's formula about 3 yrs. ago but it still works and this is not a knock off. Good product. If you need more exfoliation I put a little Clinique super-exfoliante on my finger tips w/the 7 day scrub once a week and it's works better.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: FORGET SPA FACIALS!!...THIS IS GOLD!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST STUFF EVER!!...This stuff works even better with a rotating facial brush (which I bought on Amazon also). This scrub is incredible!!...I have combo skin, olive tone color and 46 years old. This stuff reguvinate my skin and repairs it overnight after being in the sun all, exposing to pool chemicals and wiping sweat from a long workout. It usually takes 1-2 days for my skin to recover but I use this every other night because thats how GREAT it is!!....I get BEST results when I apply my moisturizer after using the scrub. I LOVE IT!!...This will be my face best friend for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem like the same scrub that I bought at the store
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scrub a few weeks ago, so gave it time to maybe move thru any little top layer that might be weird, but it's still the same as the first time I used it. It doesn't smell the same as the scrub I purchased at the store which had a refreshing minty smell and tingly feel to it when I use it. This one is missing that element altogether. The smell isn't unpleasant, but isn't anything I want on my face/under my nose either. It also feels like there is more grit & slicker mud than my previous Clinque scrub, which isn't overwhelming, but, again, just isn't the product I thought I was buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin hydrated and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample size at Ulta. I used it, loved it and immediately ordered it. The price from this retailer was incredible. I got ( 2) 2.5 bottles for significantly less than one 3.4oz bottle. I love the way this product makes my skin feel. It's hydrated and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA BRIGGS

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my face so smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this scrub for years. Once done my face and neck feel so smooth and soft. I am EXTREMELY sensitive to chemicals and can find few things I can use on my face but this works fine.
customer_reviews.author: NPG

customer_reviews.title: A perfect exfolliannt. For any skin..
customer_reviews.text: Its ann exfolliantr,bbut its not irritating if you have aensitive skin.. you face feels clean, but. not irritted. I use. It. 3 to 4 timmes a week
customer_reviews.author: Fran Jarmon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exfoliating and deep cleansing but its not to harsh on my sensitive skin...Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda M :0)

customer_reviews.title: Careful!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't purchased this product in a while, but it seems to be quite a bit rougher than I remember. They did change from microbeads, so their replacement (silica) must be sharper. I'd suggest being very careful gentle with this exfoliator until you see how your skin is going to react.
customer_reviews.author: JZ's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for me
customer_reviews.text: good for oily skin but it is very light, it does not have the thick lumps as I like it
customer_reviews.author: Yani García

customer_reviews.title: For all ages
customer_reviews.text: The best scrub on the market, it does the job without hurting your skin.
customer_reviews.author: cakes

customer_reviews.title: Great facial exfoliate
customer_reviews.text: My go to facial scrub for well over 10 years. Removes daily surface dirty without over exfoliating.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Not the wonderful original 7 Day Scrub
customer_reviews.text: I realize that Clinique wanted to make a gentler product but now this is no different from most others on the market. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Researcher

customer_reviews.title: Is this the real deal?
customer_reviews.text: I am unsure if this is the real product. It was shipped in a white envelope without a Clinque box. The lid was sealed with scotch tape. The scrub seems similar than the ones I bought directly from Clinque, however I used it a while back so it is difficult to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Jan-Georg van der wath

customer_reviews.title: There are so few granules that it is rendered useless as a scrub
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same formula it used to be. There are so few granules that it is rendered useless as a scrub. Very disappointed. It's going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: BookLovingLady

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I love the real Clinique 7 Day Scrub but I am pretty sure that this is a knock off. It doesn't smell right.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s the real thing but works good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s the real thing but works good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this. Product arrived in no box, no safety seal and felt light.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Butler

customer_reviews.title: Not dry skin after scrub
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! You can scrub your face every day and not get dry. The texture of the cream makes me feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They changed it to be not gritty enough to scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Looove this scrub! I have sensitive skin and my skin becomes so clear and smooth when I use it!
customer_reviews.author: Janay Badger

customer_reviews.title: Fake stuff
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE: This is not the real stuff. No granules and was not in original box. Wanted to share to warn others. I’m returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This particular bottle didn't seem to have as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: This particular bottle didn't seem to have as much as the exfoliant as I expected. It was certainly more on the "creamy" side than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love ! I’ve been using this since December of 2018 and my skin feels amazing! It’s like getting a facial every day !
customer_reviews.author: Jessica  Vens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my face soft and fresh - 7 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for 20 years. It's the only exfoliator gentle enough for my face. It's very effective for removing dry, flaky, dead skin. The cost is much lower than other exfoliators.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, and happy to be able to buy it here
customer_reviews.text: I had a sample of this stuff years ago. I remembered how nice it was and ordered it again. I am so glad I did. How nice to have it just show up at your home and not have to deal with the department store employees.
customer_reviews.author: Iris girl

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: it's fine for using every day. my skin feels clean after using it. It seems to have somewhat but not entirely cleared up a skin condition that I was having (sebhorreaic dermatitis). It feels like it's cleaning but it's not too abrasive. It's expensive, but right now it's worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lou

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products online! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: The real deal 7 day scrub Ive used forever. Unscented, really kind to my old sensitive skin. So glad I could buy it online!
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaBlondieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Nice scrub, not too harsh.
customer_reviews.text: Nice scrub, not too harsh.This is a nice scrub and I’ve used it for years. The thing is it’s pretty expensive and you can buy something else at the drugstore that’s comparable. It’s not oily. And there’s no sent so it does not conflict with your perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years - makes your face so soft and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Ila J

customer_reviews.title: Our #1 choice of exfoliating cream!
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I love this! It’s the best exfoliating cream we have found, and we have used it for years...
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I've been using Clinique for over 40 years. Started ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clinique for over 40 years. Started using this scrub in my 30s because my skin was getting to be really flakey. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: MARY CRAVEN

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite scrub, been using for years. It works well on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good face wash
customer_reviews.text: Initially wrong item but they promptly sent the correct one. Great shipping times and easy to open :). Used this product for many years and love it
customer_reviews.author: OnyxBuni

customer_reviews.title: Safe, gentle and pretty effective
customer_reviews.text: Gentle and a pretty good cleanser. I’d prefer more “scrub” in my scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Sedona Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: The tube (bottle) had no seal, no original box. It came in a ziplock bag. It seems like it was used before.
customer_reviews.author: Aline

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product over 6 months and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product over 6 months and it clarifies my skin. Since 1988 I've always had a Clinique toner, cream or face wash as a part of my routine
customer_reviews.author: mjramoutar

customer_reviews.title: Product still works great.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging getting smaller and smaller these days for same prices. Yikes. Product still works great.
customer_reviews.author: MK

product_meta.title: Clinique 7 Day Scrub Cream Rinse-off Formula 2.5 Oz / 75 Ml
product_meta.description: Nudges away roughness, flakiness to refine skin. Helps lessen the appearance of fine lines. Clears the way for moisture. Suitable for all skin types.
